page.title: 05Ashbourne Grammar School.
page.content: The school is called{Queen Elizabeth {Grammar School.}1112 children attend the school.The school takes 180 new pupils each year.The school was founded in{1585 by Queen Elizabeth 1. This year it was th e schools 400th anniversary and Queen{Elizabeth 2}came to celebrate.The headmaster showed the Queen round the school.The school was founded by{Royal Charter}and although it is a comprehensive it still bears the name Grammar.An{Act of Parliament would be needed to change the name.The school uniform is a black blazer with a red and white tie,black trousers or a grey skirt,a grey jumper,a blue or white shirt or blouse and grey or black shoes.The school is split up,the Upper School is in the centre of Ashbourne, the Lower school is near the old Air Field.The two sites are one and a half miles apart.
